issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Lately console installed from packages on CentOS throws an internal error right after log in. After I restarted console, it throws internal error when the ui is accessed.

comments.body: Seems to affect package install on centos, not source on my mac. Will test source on Centos to debug.

The pull request at https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/521 may fix the issue for environments with Beaker 1.5.4 (e.g. CentOS), but we need to test on more recent versions of Beaker if passing the self arg is handled gracefully there.

The odd thing is that though the beaker package said 1.5.4, the code installed was actually 1.6.4. I compared the stack trace with tagged versions on github. I'll take this up with the packaging team.
[~dkavanagh] How can I review this? Should I check on an install from source?
You could, but I pushed this last night with the hopes it would make it into the nightly packages. I'd just wait for a nightly build that includes this to properly test from packages.

Just tested it with latest packages  http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/builds/eucaconsole/commit/221b7dfea7f9b351393f5045f22a8f9008b86b80-2014-04-07-012/centos/6/x86_64/

I can log in now, but get internal error when accessing Instances page. Movie attached.
I tested on a console installed on CentOS on MAC/FF with cache and cookies cleared before test.
Still see Internal error when accessing instances page.
I also get internal error when trying to add Group policy.

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/525

I will merge this once CI tests pass. This is for the same reason the initial problem occurred. I checked other places in the code and we should be safe from this problem elsewhere.
Pull request 525 approved and merged (TravisCI passed)

[~dkavanagh], just tested packages http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/builds/eucaconsole/commit/067664de7714323a59201a369a9b44f75fcdb68b-2014-04-08-005/centos/6/x86_64/ on CentOS with FF/MAC. I get internal error on log in. Cleared cookies/cache, as usual, before test.

Not me this time Kamal pushed some code for cache invalidation. Pls assign
to him now.
On Apr 8, 2014 6:10 PM, "Alice Hubenko (JIRA)" <

The fix for the cache clearing issue (GUI-689) in https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/524 requires code that isn't available in Beaker 1.5.4 (it first landed in Beaker 1.6).  

A subsequent pull request (https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/527) was opened and merged to unblock testing with packages, but we'll need to find a workaround to properly empty the connection objects from cache on login/logout.  Will continue working on this ticket.
